name: Dignus Orb
loreDescription: "Whenever times are hard, I just look up to the sky, and it shows me the way forward."

skillDescription.base: Grants a barrier equivalent to 60.0% of Attack for 2 turns when caster uses a non-attack skill.
skillDescription.max: Grants a barrier equivalent to 120.0% of Attack for 2 turns when caster uses a non-attack skill.
